I use run-length encoding a fair bit, and wrote {purler} in order to have some features not available in base::rle()

* 10x faster (using C code)
* Intuitive handling of NAs
* Result returned as a data.frame for tidy manipulation!

Now with hex!

https://t.co/kIc7DQmFHx
